FuncDef: The display soc attack-defend statistics port-vlan-car command displays CAR statistics of interfaces on a specified board.
CLIs: display soc attack-defend statistics slot <slot-id> port-vlan-car

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of a board.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display soc attack-defend statistics slot 1 port-vlan-car
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the SOC's attack defense function is enabled, you can run the display soc attack-defend statistics port-vlan-car command to check statistics about the packets that pass through or are discarded by the interfaces being attacked on the board in a specified slot.
This command displays statistics of only physical or logical interfaces being attacked on the board in a specified slot.
Prerequisites
The SOC's attack defense function has been enabled.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
